name: Common Cold
remedies: Drink warm fluids like herbal tea, soup, or warm water with lemon
Gargle with salt water for sore throat
Honey and ginger tea to soothe cough
Steam inhalation with eucalyptus or menthol
Get plenty of rest and stay hydrated
prevention: Boost immunity with Vitamin C-rich foods
Stay warm and avoid sudden temperature changes

name: Influenza (Flu)
prevention: Avoid close contact with sick people
Cover mouth and nose while coughing/sneezing

name: Dry Skin
symptoms: Cracked skin especially on hands and heels
remedies: Apply coconut oil or almond oil after bath

name: Sore Throat
symptoms: Pain or scratchy sensation in throat
remedies: Warm salt water gargles (Â½ tsp salt in warm water)
Honey and lemon in warm water
Herbal teas with ginger, licorice, or tulsi
Lozenges or hard candy to keep throat moist
prevention: Avoid cold drinks and ice cream
Keep throat covered in cold weather

name: Dry Cough
remedies: Honey with black pepper or ginger
Steam inhalation with a few drops of eucalyptus oil
Keep throat moist with warm fluids
prevention: Use scarf to cover mouth in cold weather
Stay away from dust and smoke

name: Sinusitis
remedies: Steam inhalation with mint or ajwain
